resources.string: Great! You can complete all tasks!
Try skipping low priorities. Then you can make it!
Skip medium task, focus on high!
You can complete all high priority tasks
Oh, you cannot complete all high tasks. Consider changing deadlines
Tell mom to have a nice day
Buy the freshest milk I can get
Welcome to DoItWithAndroid, since this is your first run, lets take a look on how to use this awesome app
This is the main menu, use it to go through application
This is your level. You will earn experience by completing your tasks. Try to complete as many tasks as you can a become a high level effective person!
This is your current experience and experience you need to reach new level. Every new level will require more experience than the last, it will get harder over time, but you can do it!

This is your time remaining today. It is how much working hours you have till the end of your day. Timer will stop when you add task, because application assumes that you gave started working. When you complete task, timer will recalculate how much time left.

There you can find tasks you should do today. You do not have to complete them in given order, order is just recommended. Every task have its own color based on its priority. RED means high, YELLOW is medium and GREEN is low. Experience gained per task is based on priority and its duration. When you complete task, simply swipe left to mark it as done.

Gray tasks are same as normal tasks, only difference is that when your tasks are grayed out, the current time is not within you working time. You can still complete task as usual, but planner will not count their duration to your working time left today, also their completion time will be same as their estimated time. Feel free to complete task out of your working time, planner will recalculate your working plan :)

If you do not have enough working time left today to fit in the whole task or you have task that is longer than you daily hours, you will still see this task on today list if its relevant. Difference is, that you will see this task with number of percent, which represents the part that will be completed when you mark this task as done
If you swipe left on you current level, you will get to quick overview of your tasks. Here you cas see if you are able to get everything done within your deadlines.

If you see this line with green check - Great! You are able to complete all your tasks and do not miss any deadline. Try to complete tasks as soon as possible to see this one green as often as you can.

If all tasks overview goes to red and this line is still green, you do not have to worry much. This means that you are still able to complete all medium and high priority task and Do It With Android will prepare plan how to complete them with ease :). However if you see this line red, that means you are not able to complete all medium priority task, so you should start working more effectively or consider changin you priorities or deadlines.

If all other goes to red and high priority stays green, there is still hope. That means you are able to complete at least all your high priority tasks, planner will ignore lower priority tasks and will make you a plan to complete your important things. If you see this red, you are in a problem. Red means that you are not able to complete all your high priority tasks no matter what you do. You will have to work out of your working hours or you will have to change deadlines/priorities
Statistics screen is exactly what it sounds to be. You can see statistics about your progress, completed tasks and more. Just scroll down and look at your statistics :)
This action will close settings and will enable tutorial to run once again. Do you really want to play tutorial again?
You should focus on this task
Welcome and Do It With Android!

Thank you for installing this app. It will help you to do things more effectively and also it will help to stop procrastinating. Since this is your first run, we have to Do some things first to get you started. I hope you will enjoy and you will improve your time management
Please set the time you normally start working, that means when you are ready to start working, e.g. after you eat your breakfast and or you drink your first coffee.

Enter the time you normally stop being productive, it should not be just before you go to bed, but the time you stop working e.g. before you have your dinner and go watch TV or even before you go to brush your teeth for someone who is really productive!
Some tasks are after their deadline
Welcome to task screen. There you can find all your tasks. From this screen you can add tasks, see status of every task and change current tasks

Here you can see all of your unfinished tasks. You can see their title, description, deadline (fire icon), estimated duration (clock icon) and on some of them there is more information. You will learn about this in short time.
When you complete just a part of your task (as you learnt on home screen) you will see how many percent of this task is completed as number with percentage and small progress under task.
If you want to edit task long press on it. To complete task from this screen simply swipe RIGHT and to delete task swipe LEFT.
When you see the deadline icon (fire) with red color, that means that this task is after its deadline. You should revisit it, since planner do not count it in your current tasks plan.

When fire turns into red flashing exclamation mark, that means this task can never meet its deadline, even if you skip lower priority tasks. There task will not show on your daily tasks, since we think that it is better to complete at least something within its deadline, than more tasks after deadlines. Try to revisit these tasks.

If you see warning sign on tasks priority strip, that means you cannot complete all tasks within their deadlines. This warning sign shown by tasks means that you should focus on them as they have higher priority

When you tap on archive tab, you will get to archive. All completed tasks are stored here, you can see info about these tasks as when you completed it and what was its real duration (tasks completed out of your working time will have their estimated time written here). If you want to reopen task (in case that new task is similar or the task is repeating) simply tap on that task and change relevant data. If you swipe RIGHT you can delete task from archive.
On top of the screen, you can see quick status of your tasks (same as on home screen) so you do not have to switch back to home to see status of your tasks
If red exclamation mark appears in top status bar, that means some of your tasks are already after deadline so you should be aware of that.
Tell mom to have a nice day
Buy the freshest milk I can get

Please be aware that author is not responsible for any missed deadline using this application. Use this application at your own risk as you can still miss any of your deadlines with no author responsibility.
Hi I would like to report feedback on your app:
